# A dedicated wildlife ecologist and geospatial scientist...

Hello, my name is Ben Tjepkes and this is my online portfolio showcasing my professional and creative projects. I am currently a graduate student at the University of Missouri in the Department of Geography where I use a variety of data science and geospatial tools to conduct research in wildlife ecology and biogeography. Thank you for stopping by my website!
